name: Baker Hughes Company
description: Baker Hughes Company is a leading energy technology company that provides solutions for the oil and gas industry. Founded in 1907 and headquartered in Houston, Texas, Baker Hughes offers a wide range of services and products that span the entire energy sector. The company specializes in oilfield services, digital solutions, and advanced manufacturing, focusing on enhancing productivity and sustainability in energy production. Baker Hughes is known for its innovative technologies that help customers optimize their operations while minimizing environmental impact. The company’s capabilities include drilling services, reservoir consulting, and subsea production systems, as well as software solutions that leverage data analytics and artificial intelligence. In recent years, Baker Hughes has also been emphasizing its commitment to energy transition, investing in technologies that support renewable energy sources and carbon capture. As the energy landscape evolves, Baker Hughes continues to adapt and innovate, positioning itself as a key player in the global push toward sustainable energy practices.
